original_title: 36  including 24 school children injured in bus accident
original_body_lines: At least 36 persons including 24 schoolchildren have been injured after a passenger bus overturned in the Siyambalanduwa area of Moneragala.
Police said that a passenger bus attached to Sri Lanka Transport Board (SLTB) which was transporting school students had toppled this morning (Feb. 29).
